title: Bruce Filosa
text: Bruce Filosa is an American college athletics administrator and former <a href="American%20football">football</a> coach. He is the <a href="athletics%20director">athletics director</a> at <a href="Brooklyn%20College">Brooklyn College</a>, a position he has held since 1994. Filosa served as head football coach at Brooklyn College from 1983 through the schools' final season of football in 1990, compiling a record of 14–54. He came to Brooklyn College in 1981 as an assistant football coach after working in the same capacity at <a href="Sheepshead%20Bay%20High%20School">Sheepshead Bay High School</a>.
